articles.title: 14 Wild Scandals And Shocking Moments That Have Gone Down In VMAs History - BuzzFeed
articles.description: From Ye vs. Taylor to Eminem getting in a screaming match with a dog puppet, I'm now convinced that the MTV Video Music Awards are the most scandalous awards show out there.

articles.title: You can now sign up for whatever the new MoviePass is going to be - The Verge
